{{disambig-more|Pen|[[Pen (disambiguation)]]}}
'''PEN''', '''PENE''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "lack, have not; be without"<ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}, pp. 171, 173 (root appearing as "√PEN", "√PENE")</ref><ref name=WJ>{{WJ|B}}, pp. 375, 408 (root appearing as *PEN)</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''[[pen#Quenya|pen]]'' ("without, not having"); ''[[penin]]'' ("no; I haven't")<ref name=PE17/>
*[[Sindarin]]: ''[[pen-]]''<ref name=PE17/>
*[[Telerin]]: ''[[Pendi]]'' ("the lacking, the poor")<ref name=WJ/>
